channel.title: Comments on: Dinner in the Gherkin

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKM/$File/kiss.gif"</a> /> Definintely a "wow" as you enter the bar and the meal was great - thank you. We really enjoyed our walk/purchases/lunch and you may regret it as the "olds" may come again!!<br/><br />Lots of love</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKM/$File/kiss.gif“ /> Definintely a “wow” as you enter the bar and the meal was great – thank you. We really enjoyed our walk/purchases/lunch and you may regret it as the “olds” may come again!!

Lots of love

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>Looks great!<br/><br /><br/><br />It seems like the perfect evening, beautiful place and great company.<br/><br />Have fun.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Looks great!

It seems like the perfect evening, beautiful place and great company.

Have fun.
